Privacy Policy

This notice discloses the privacy practices of the Cyberknights. This privacy notice applies only to information collected by this website and will notify you of the following: What PII (personally identifiable information) is collected from you through our website How PII is used and with whom it is shared What choices are available to you regarding the use of your data The security procedures in place to protect you from misuse of your information How you can correct inaccurate information Information Collection, Use, and Sharing Cyberknights and MGA are the sole owner of the information collected on this site. We only have access to/collect information that you voluntarily give us via email or other direct contact from you. We will not sell or rent this information to anyone. We will use your information to respond to you, regarding the reason you contacted us. We will not share your information with any third party outside of our organization, other than as necessary to fulfill your request, e.g. to communicate with the student’s teacher. Unless you ask us not to, we may contact you via email in the future to tell you about specials, new products or services, or changes to this privacy policy. Your Access to and Control Over Information You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time. You can do the following at any time by contacting us via the email address or phone number given on our website: See what data we have about you, if any Change/correct any data we have about you Have us delete any data we have about you Express any concern you have about our use of your data Security We take protection of your information very seriously. When you submit sensitive information via the website, your information is protected both online and offline. Wherever we collect sensitive information, that information is transmitted in a secure way. You can verify this by looking for a lock icon in the address bar and looking for "https" at the beginning of the address of the Web page. Only Cyberknights personnel who need the information to perform a specific job are granted access to personally identifiable information. The computers/servers in which we store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment. If you feel that we are not abiding by this privacy policy, you should contact us immediately via telephone at 706-601-2848 or cybertrainingforceacademy@gmail.com.

As it stands right now, the two main title header tags, h1 and h2, the h1 tag is set to be a centered title, while the h2 tag is the same size, but it is left-aligned.


Example h1 tag

Example h2 tag

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque pretium tortor non ornare venenatis. Morbi imperdiet facilisis commodo. Fusce efficitur tortor odio, pellentesque pellentesque neque ornare a.
